import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get current user locations (filtered)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/users/my/locations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns locations accessible to the currently authenticated user with advanced filtering via request body. Use this when you need to filter by location type, permissions, or pagination beyond query parameters.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build a `GetUserLocationsRequest` with filters and paging.
2. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/users/my/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-current-user-locations-filtered-v-2).
3. Use the returned list to render location selectors or permission-aware views.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Filters are optional.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request options for filtering locations by user permissions. Extends standard request options with permission-based filtering flags.","properties":{"Paging":{"type":"object","description":"Pagination options","properties":{"PageIndex":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Zero-based page index"},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":1000,"description":"Number of records per page"}}},"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Array of filter criteria to apply","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Facet":{"type":"string","description":"Field name to filter on"},"Values":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter values"}}}},"HasViewLocationPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'location.view' permission"},"HasManageLocationPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'location.manage' permission"},"HasViewTicketsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'tickets.view' permission"},"HasWorkTicketsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'tickets.work' permission"},"HasResolveTicketsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'tickets.resolve' permission"},"HasSubmitTicketsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'tickets.submit' permission"},"HasViewAssetsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'assets.view' permission"},"HasViewEventsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'events.view' permission"},"HasManageEventsPermission":{"type":"boolean","description":"Filter to locations where user has 'events.manage' permission"}},"title":"GetUserLocationsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

when the address was last modified"}},"required":["AddressId"],"title":"Address"}]},"LocationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the location type
